Translations.Text: When the sky is torn
And it allowed its Lord, and was ready
And when the land is stretched
And it spits out what is in it and becomes empty
And it permits its Lord, and is ready
O man, you will be returning to your Lord with your actions and meeting Him
So whoever is given his record in his right
He will then receive an easy reckoning
And he will return to his family in joy
And as for he who is given his record behind his back
He will invoke his destruction
And he will enter a blazing Fire
He was with his people in joy
He thought he would not be returned
No, He is ever seeing of him
So, I swear by the redness of dusk
And the night and what it is driven on
And the moon when it is full
You will ride a vessel upon a vessel
So what is the matter with them that they do not believe
And when the Quran is being related to them, they do not prostrate
No, those who have rejected are in denial
And God is more aware of what they gather
So inform them of a painful retribution
Except for those who believe and do good works, they will have a reward that will not end
By the universe laden with towers
And the appointed Day
And a witness and a witnessed
Dead are the people of the canyon
The Fire supplied with fuel
They will be placed in it
And they were witness to what they did to the believers
And all they had asked them was to believe in God, the Noble, the Praiseworthy
The One to whom belongs kingship of heavens and Earth, and God is witness over everything
Those who have put the believing men and women under ordeal, and then did not repent, they will have the retribution of Hell, and they will have the retribution of burning
Those who believe and do good works, they will have gardens with rivers flowing beneath. Such is the great reward
The punishment of your Lord is severe
It is He who initiates and then returns
And He is the Forgiver, the Most Kind
Possessor of the throne, the Glorious
Doer of what He wills
Has news come to you of the soldiers
Pharaoh and Thamud
No, those who rejected are in denial
And God after them is encompassing
No, it is a glorious Quran
In a tablet, preserved
And the sky and the herald
And do you know what the herald is
The piercing star
Every soul has a recorder over it
So let man see from what he was created
He was created from water that gushes forth
It comes out from between the spine and the testicles
For He is able to bring him back
The Day when all is revealed
Then he will not have any power or victor
And the sky which gives rain
And the land with small cracks
This is the word that separates matters
And it is not a thing for amusement
They are scheming their schemes
And I scheme a scheme
So respite the rejecters, respite them for a while
